long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ScreenCapture is a powerful, user-friendly browser extension designed to make capturing, editing, and sharing screenshots a breeze. When you need to save a full webpage, ScreenCapture provides all the tools necessary to meet your screen capturing needs seamlessly. It was created by Olayinka Idris as part of her requirements to fulfill the research portion of her Master's at Swansea University.
